00125 //----------------------------------------------------------
00126 GrImage::GrImage( const UPath& name, EFORMAT format, unsigned int width, unsigned int height, void* data )
00127 : _name( name )
00128 , _bits( new void*[ 1 ] )
00129 , _width( width )
00130 , _height( height )
00131 , _bytesPerPel( _elemsPerPixel[ format ] * _elemSize[ format ] )
00132 , _mipCount( 1 )
00133 , _maxMipCount( 1 )
00134 , _fmt( format )
00135 {
00136         unsigned int imageSize = _width * _height * _bytesPerPel;
00137         _bits[ 0 ] = new unsigned char [ imageSize ];
00138 
00140         if ( data )
00141                 MemCopy( _bits[ 0 ], data, imageSize );
00142 }
00143 
00144 //----------------------------------------------------------
00145 GrImage::GrImage( const UPath& name, unsigned long bgraColor )
00146 : _name( name )
00147 , _bits( new void *[ 1 ] )
00148 , _width( 1 )
00149 , _height( 1 )
00150 , _bytesPerPel( 4 )
00151 , _mipCount( 1 )
00152 , _maxMipCount( 1 )
00153 , _fmt( EF_BGRA32 )
00154 {
00155         _bits[ 0 ] = new unsigned char[ 4 ];
00156         ( ( unsigned long * )_bits[ 0 ] )[ 0 ] = bgraColor;
00157 }

00172 //----------------------------------------------------------
00173 GrImage::GrImage( const GrImage& image )
00174 : _name( image._name )
00175 , _bits( new void*[ image._maxMipCount ] )
00176 , _width( image._width )
00177 , _height( image._height )
00178 , _bytesPerPel( image._bytesPerPel )
00179 , _mipCount( 1 )
00180 , _maxMipCount( image._maxMipCount )
00181 , _fmt( image._fmt )
00182 {
00184         unsigned int imageSize = _width * _height * _bytesPerPel;
00185         _bits[ 0 ] = new unsigned char [ imageSize ];
00186         MemCopy( _bits[ 0 ], image._bits[ 0 ], imageSize );
00187 }

00189 //----------------------------------------------------------
00190 GrImage::~GrImage()
00191 {
00193         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _mipCount; ++i )
00194         {
00196                 delete[] ( unsigned char* )_bits[ i ];
00197         }
00198         delete[] _bits;
00199 }

00220 //----------------------------------------------------------
00221 void
00222 GrImage::ConvertToI8( bool keepMipMaps )
00223 {
00225         if ( _fmt == EF_I8 )
00226                 return;
00227 
00229         bool rebuildMipMaps = _mipCount != 1 && keepMipMaps;
00230         ClearMipMaps();
00231 
00233         void* finalImage = new unsigned char[ _width * _height ];
00234         if ( _fmt == EF_BGRA32 )
00235         {
00236                 unsigned char* src = ( unsigned char* )_bits[ 0 ];
00237                 unsigned char* dst = ( unsigned char* )finalImage;
00238                 unsigned int elemCount = _elemsPerPixel[ _fmt ];
00239                 for ( unsigned int y = 0; y < _height; ++y )
00240                         for ( unsigned int x = 0; x < _width; ++x, src += elemCount, ++dst )
00241                                 *dst = src[ 3 ];        
00242         }
00243         else if ( _fmt == EF_BGR24 )
00244         {
00245                 unsigned char* src = ( unsigned char* )_bits[ 0 ];
00246                 unsigned char* dst = ( unsigned char* )finalImage;
00247                 unsigned int elemCount = _elemsPerPixel[ _fmt ];
00248                 for ( unsigned int y = 0; y < _height; ++y )
00249                         for ( unsigned int x = 0; x < _width; ++x, src += elemCount, ++dst )
00250                                 *dst = *src;            
00251         }
00252         else
00253         {
00255                 B_ASSERT( false );
00256         }
00257 
00259         _fmt = EF_I8;
00260 
00262         delete[] ( unsigned char* )_bits[ 0 ];
00263         _bits[ 0 ] = finalImage;
00264 
00266         if ( rebuildMipMaps )
00267                 GenMipMaps( false );
00268 }

00270 //----------------------------------------------------------
00271 void
00272 GrImage::ConvertToLA16( bool keepMipMaps )
00273 {
00275         if ( _fmt == EF_LA16 )
00276                 return;
00277 
00279         B_ASSERT( _fmt == EF_BGRA32 );
00280 
00282         bool rebuildMipMaps = _mipCount != 1 && keepMipMaps;
00283         ClearMipMaps();
00284 
00286         void* finalImage = new unsigned char[ _width * _height * 2 ];
00287         unsigned char* src = ( unsigned char* )_bits[ 0 ];
00288         unsigned char* dst = ( unsigned char* )finalImage;
00289         unsigned int elemCount = _elemsPerPixel[ _fmt ];
00290         if ( _fmt == EF_BGRA32 )
00291         {
00292                 for ( unsigned int y = 0; y < _height; ++y )
00293                 {
00294                         for ( unsigned int x = 0; x < _width; ++x, src += elemCount, dst += 2 )
00295                         {
00296                                 dst[ 0 ] = src[ 0 ];            
00297                                 dst[ 1 ] = src[ 3 ];            
00298                         }
00299                 }
00300         }
00301         else if ( _fmt == EF_BGR24 )
00302         {
00303                 for ( unsigned int y = 0; y < _height; ++y )
00304                 {
00305                         for ( unsigned int x = 0; x < _width; ++x, src += elemCount, dst += 2 )
00306                         {
00307                                 dst[ 0 ] = src[ 0 ];            
00308                                 dst[ 1 ] = 255;                         
00309                         }
00310                 }
00311         }
00312         else if ( _fmt == EF_I8 )
00313         {
00314                 for ( unsigned int y = 0; y < _height; ++y )
00315                 {
00316                         for ( unsigned int x = 0; x < _width; ++x, src += elemCount, dst += 2 )
00317                         {
00318                                 dst[ 0 ] = src[ 0 ];
00319                                 dst[ 1 ] = src[ 0 ];
00320                         }
00321                 }
00322         }
00323         else
00324         {
00326                 B_ASSERT( false );
00327         }
00328 
00330         _fmt = EF_LA16;
00331 
00333         delete[] ( unsigned char* )_bits[ 0 ];
00334         _bits[ 0 ] = finalImage;
00335 
00337         if ( rebuildMipMaps )
00338                 GenMipMaps( false );
00339 }

00341 //----------------------------------------------------------
00342 void
00343 GrImage::ConvertBGR24ToBGRA32()
00344 {
00346         B_ASSERT( _fmt == EF_BGR24 );
00347 
00349         unsigned int mipWidth = _width;
00350         unsigned int mipHeight = _height;
00351         unsigned char* src = 0;
00352         unsigned char* dst = 0;
00353         unsigned char* newMip = 0;
00354         for ( unsigned int mip = 0; mip < _mipCount; ++mip )
00355         {
00357                 src = ( unsigned char* )_bits[ mip ];
00358 
00361                 newMip = dst = new unsigned char[ mipWidth * mipHeight * 4 ];
00362                 for ( unsigned int y = 0; y < mipHeight; ++y )
00363                 {
00364                         for ( unsigned int x = 0; x < mipWidth; ++x, dst += 4 )
00365                         {
00366                                 for ( unsigned int e = 0; e < 3; ++e, ++src )
00367                                         dst[ e ] = *src;
00368                                 dst[ 3 ] = 255;
00369                         }
00370                 }
00371 
00373                 delete[] ( unsigned char* )_bits[ mip ];
00374                 _bits[ mip ] = newMip;
00375 
00377                 mipWidth = Max( mipWidth >> 1, 1U );
00378                 mipHeight = Max( mipHeight >> 1, 1U );
00379         }
00380 
00382         _fmt = EF_BGRA32;
00383         _bytesPerPel = 4;
00384 }
00385 
00386 //----------------------------------------------------------
00387 void
00388 GrImage::SwizzleToBXRG()
00389 {
00393         if ( _fmt == EF_I8 || _fmt == EF_LA16 || _fmt == EF_LA64F )
00394                 return;
00395 
00397         B_ASSERT( !IsFloatImage() );
00398 
00399         unsigned int mipWidth = 0;
00400         unsigned int mipHeight = 0;
00401         if ( !IsFloatImage() )
00402         {
00403                 unsigned char* src = 0;
00404                 unsigned char* dst = 0;
00405 
00407                 if ( _fmt == EF_BGR24 )
00408                         ConvertBGR24ToBGRA32();
00409 
00411                 B_ASSERT( _fmt == EF_BGRA32 );
00412 
00414                 mipWidth = _width;
00415                 mipHeight = _height;
00416                 for ( unsigned int mip = 0; mip < _mipCount; ++mip )
00417                 {
00418                         src = ( unsigned char* )_bits[ mip ];
00419                         for ( unsigned int y = 0; y < mipHeight; ++y )
00420                         {
00421                                 for ( unsigned int x = 0; x < mipWidth; ++x, src += 4 )
00422                                 {
00425 
00427                                         float nx = 2.0f * ( src[ 2 ] / 255.0f ) - 1.0f;
00428                                         float ny = 2.0f * ( src[ 1 ] / 255.0f ) - 1.0f;
00429                                         float nz = 2.0f * ( src[ 0 ] / 255.0f ) - 1.0f;
00430 
00432                                         float invZ = 1.0f / nz;
00433                                         nx *= invZ;
00434                                         ny *= invZ;
00435 
00437                                         src[ 0 ] = 255;
00438                                         src[ 1 ] = 255;
00439                                         src[ 2 ] = ( unsigned char )Clamp( ( 0.5f * nx + 0.5f ) * 255.0f, 0.0f, 255.0f );
00440                                         src[ 3 ] = ( unsigned char )Clamp( ( 0.5f * ny + 0.5f ) * 255.0f, 0.0f, 255.0f );
00441                                 }
00442                         }
00443                         mipWidth = Max( mipWidth >> 1, 1U );
00444                         mipHeight = Max( mipHeight >> 1, 1U );
00445                 }
00446         }
00447         else
00448         {
00449                 B_ASSERT( false );
00450         }
00451 }

00453 //----------------------------------------------------------
00454 void
00455 GrImage::CompressDXT1( bool normalMap )
00456 {
00458         if ( _fmt == EF_BGR24 )
00459                 ConvertBGR24ToBGRA32();
00460 
00462         B_ASSERT( _fmt == EF_BGRA32 );
00463 
00466         GenMipMaps( normalMap );
00467 
00469         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _mipCount; ++i )
00470         {
00472                 unsigned int mipWidth = Max( _width >> i, 1U );
00473                 unsigned int mipHeight = Max( _height >> i, 1U );
00474 
00476                 unsigned int dataSize = CalcImageSizeDXT1( mipWidth, mipHeight );
00477                 unsigned char* data = new unsigned char[ dataSize ];
00478 
00480                 unsigned char* src = ( unsigned char* )_bits[ i ];
00481 
00483 		::CompressDXT1( ( unsigned int* )data, mipWidth, mipHeight, ( unsigned int* )src );
00484 
00487                 delete[] src;
00488                 _bits[ i ] = data;
00489         }
00490 
00492         _bytesPerPel = 0;
00493         _fmt = EF_BGR_DXT1;
00494 }
00495

00497 void
00498 GrImage::CompressDXT5( bool normalMap )
00499 {
00502         B_ASSERT( _fmt == EF_BGRA32 );
00503 
00506         GenMipMaps( normalMap );
00507 
00509         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _mipCount; ++i )
00510         {
00512                 unsigned int mipWidth = Max( _width >> i, 1U );
00513                 unsigned int mipHeight = Max( _height >> i, 1U );
00514 
00516                 unsigned int dataSize = CalcImageSizeDXT5( mipWidth, mipHeight );;
00517                 unsigned char* data = new unsigned char[ dataSize ];
00518 
00520                 unsigned char* src = ( unsigned char* )_bits[ i ];
00521 
00523 		::CompressDXT5( ( unsigned int* )data, mipWidth, mipHeight, ( unsigned int* )src );
00524 
00527                 delete[] src;
00528                 _bits[ i ] = data;
00529         }
00530 
00532         _bytesPerPel = 0;
00533         _fmt = EF_BGRA_DXT5;

00536 //----------------------------------------------------------
00537 void
00538 GrImage::GenMipMaps( bool normalMap )
00539 {
00540         EnsureMipLevel( _maxMipCount-1, normalMap );
00541 }
00542 
00543 //----------------------------------------------------------
00544 void
00545 GrImage::ClearMipMaps()
00546 {
00547         if ( !HasMipMaps() )
00548                 return;
00549 
00551         for ( unsigned int i = 1; i < _mipCount; ++i )
00552         {
00553                 delete[] ( unsigned char* )_bits[ i ];
00554                 _bits[ i ] = 0;
00555         }
00556         _mipCount = 1;
00557 }

00559 //----------------------------------------------------------
00560 void
00561 GrImage::TexImage2D( unsigned int bindTarget, unsigned int glTexFormat, unsigned int startMip,
00562                                          unsigned int mipCount, bool normalMap )
00563 {
00565         B_ASSERT( ( startMip + mipCount ) <= _maxMipCount );
00566 
00568 #if !defined _NO_TEXTURE_TEST
00569         if ( mipCount == 0 )
00570                 mipCount = _maxMipCount;
00571         else
00572                 mipCount += startMip;
00573         mipCount = Min( mipCount, _maxMipCount );
00574 
00576         for ( unsigned int i = startMip; i < mipCount; ++i )
00577         {
00578                 unsigned int mipLevel = ( i - startMip );
00579                 unsigned int mipWidth = Max( _width >> i, 1U );
00580                 unsigned int mipHeight = Max( _height >> i, 1U );
00581                 unsigned int format = _imageFormatMap[ _fmt ];
00582                 if ( _fmt == EF_I8 )
00583                 {
00585                         if ( glTexFormat == GL_ALPHA8 || glTexFormat == GL_ALPHA )
00586                                 format = GL_ALPHA;
00587                 }
00588 
00589                 EnsureMipLevel( i, normalMap );
00590                 bglTexImage2D( bindTarget, mipLevel, glTexFormat, mipWidth, mipHeight, 0,
00591                         format, _imageTypeMap[ _fmt ], _bits[ i ] );
00592         }
00593 #else
00594         bglTexImage2D( bindTarget, 0, glTexFormat, 1, 1, 0, _imageFormatMap[ _fmt ],
00595                 _imageTypeMap[ _fmt ], _bits[ _mipCount - 1 ] );
00596 #endif
00597 
00598         CHECK_GL();
00599 }
00600 
00601 //----------------------------------------------------------
00602 void
00603 GrImage::TexSubImage2D( unsigned int bindTarget, unsigned int glTexFormat, unsigned int startMip,
00604                                             unsigned int mipCount, bool normalMap )
00605 {
00607         B_ASSERT( ( startMip + mipCount ) <= _maxMipCount );
00608 
00609 #if !defined _NO_TEXTURE_TEST
00611         if ( mipCount == 0 )
00612                 mipCount = _maxMipCount;
00613         else
00614                 mipCount += startMip;
00615         mipCount = Min( mipCount, _maxMipCount );
00616 
00618         for ( unsigned int i = startMip; i < mipCount; ++i )
00619         {
00621                 unsigned int mipLevel = ( i - startMip );
00622                 unsigned int mipWidth = Max( _width >> i, 1U );
00623                 unsigned int mipHeight = Max( _height >> i, 1U );
00624                 unsigned int format = _imageFormatMap[ _fmt ];
00625                 if ( _fmt == EF_I8 )
00626                 {
00628                         if ( glTexFormat == GL_ALPHA8 || glTexFormat == GL_ALPHA )
00629                                 format = GL_ALPHA;
00630                 }

00634                 bglTexSubImage2D( bindTarget, mipLevel, 0, 0, mipWidth, mipHeight, format,
00635                         _imageTypeMap[ _fmt ], _bits[ i ] );
00636         }
00637 #else

00639                 _imageTypeMap[ _fmt ], _bits[ _mipCount - 1 ] );

00645 //----------------------------------------------------------
00646 void
00647 GrImage::CompressedTexImage2D( unsigned int bindTarget, unsigned int glTexFormat, unsigned int startMip,
00648                                                            unsigned int mipCount, bool normalMap )
00649 {
00652 #if _DEBUG
00653         B_ASSERT( _fmt == EF_BGR_DXT1 || _fmt == EF_BGRA_DXT5 );
00654         B_ASSERT( _mipCount == _maxMipCount );
00655         if ( _fmt == EF_BGR_DXT1 )
00656         {
00657                 B_ASSERT( glTexFormat == GL_COMPRESSED_RGB_S3TC_DXT1_EXT );
00658         }
00659         else
00660         {
00661                 B_ASSERT( glTexFormat == GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_S3TC_DXT5_EXT );
00662         }
00663 #endif
00664 
00665 #if !defined _NO_TEXTURE_TEST
00667         if ( mipCount == 0 )
00668                 mipCount = _maxMipCount;
00669         else
00670                 mipCount += startMip;
00671         mipCount = Min( mipCount, _maxMipCount );
00672 
00674         for ( unsigned int i = startMip; i < mipCount; ++i )
00675         {
00677                 unsigned int mipLevel = ( i - startMip );
00678                 unsigned int mipWidth = Max( _width >> i, 1U );
00679                 unsigned int mipHeight = Max( _height >> i, 1U );
00680                 unsigned int mipSize = 0;
00681                 if ( _fmt == EF_BGR_DXT1 )
00682                         mipSize = CalcImageSizeDXT1( mipWidth, mipHeight );
00683                 else
00684                         mipSize = CalcImageSizeDXT5( mipWidth, mipHeight );
00685 
00687                 EnsureMipLevel( i, normalMap );
00688                 bglCompressedTexImage2D( bindTarget, mipLevel, glTexFormat, mipWidth, mipHeight, 0,
00689                         mipSize, _bits[ i ] );
00690         }
00691 #else
00692         bglTexImage2D( bindTarget, 0, glTexFormat, 1, 1, 0, _imageFormatMap[ _fmt ],
00693                 _imageTypeMap[ _fmt ], _bits[ _mipCount - 1 ] );
00694 #endif
00695 
00696         CHECK_GL();
00697 }

00699 //----------------------------------------------------------
00700 void*
00701 GrImage::GetImageData( unsigned int mipLevel )
00702 {
00703         B_ASSERT( mipLevel < _maxMipCount );
00704         EnsureMipLevel( mipLevel, false );
00705         return _bits[ mipLevel ];
00706 }

00713 //----------------------------------------------------------
00714 void
00715 GrImage::Load( const UPath& name, UReader& reader )
00716 {
00718         size_t extDot = name.GetPathString().find_last_of( '.' );
00719         tstring ext;
00720         if ( extDot != tstring::npos )
00721         {
00722                 ext = name.GetPathString().substr( extDot + 1 );
00723         }
00724 
00726         if ( _stricmp( ext.c_str(), "dds" ) == 0 )
00727         {
00728                 ReadDDS( name, reader );
00729         }
00730         else if ( _stricmp( ext.c_str(), "tga" ) == 0 )
00731         {
00732                 ReadTGA( name, reader );
00733         }
00734         else
00735         {
00737                 B_ASSERT( false );
00738         }
00739 }
00740 
00741 //----------------------------------------------------------
00742 void
00743 GrImage::ReadDDS( const UPath& name, UReader& reader )
00744 {
00745         enum EIMAGEFLAGS
00746         {
00747                 kPitchFlag              = 0x00000008,   
00748                 kLinearSizeFlag = 0x00080000,   
00749                 kDepthFlag              = 0x00800000,   
00750                 kMipMapCountFlag= 0x00020000,   
00751         };
00752 
00753         enum EFORMATFLAGS
00754         {
00755                 kAlphaFlag              = 0x00000001,
00756                 kFourCCFlag             = 0x00000004,
00757                 kRGBFlag                = 0x00000040,
00758         };
00759 
00760         enum EIMAGECAPS1
00761         {
00762                 kComplex                = 0x00000008,   
00763                 kMipMapFlag             = 0x00400000,   
00764         };
00765 
00766         enum EIMAGECAPS2
00767         {
00768                 kCubeMapFlag    = 0x00000200,   
00769                 kCubePositiveXFlag      = 0x00000400,   
00770                 kCubeNegativeXFlag      = 0x00000800,   
00771                 kCubePositiveYFlag      = 0x00001000,   
00772                 kCubeNegativeYFlag      = 0x00002000,   
00773                 kCubePositiveZFlag      = 0x00004000,   
00774                 kCubeNegativeZFlag      = 0x00008000,   
00775                 kVolumeFlag             = 0x00200000,   
00776         };
00777 
00778         struct Header
00779         {
00780                 unsigned long   reserved;               
00781                 unsigned long   imageFlags;             
00782                 unsigned long   height;
00783                 unsigned long   width;
00784                 unsigned long   pitchOrLinSize; 
00785                 unsigned long   depth;
00786                 unsigned long   mipMapCount;
00787                 unsigned long   reserved1[ 11 ];
00788                 unsigned long   reserved2;              
00789                 unsigned long   formatFlags;    
00790                 unsigned long   fourCC;                 
00791                 unsigned long   bitCount;               
00792                 unsigned long   redMask;                
00793                 unsigned long   greenMask;              
00794                 unsigned long   blueMask;               
00795                 unsigned long   alphaMask;              
00796                 unsigned long   imageCaps1;             
00797                 unsigned long   imageCaps2;             
00798         };
00799 
00801         unsigned int magic = reader.ReadInt();
00802         B_ASSERT( magic == MAKE_FOUR_CC( 'D','D','S',' ' ) );
00803 
00805         Header header;
00806         reader.ReadBytes( &header, sizeof( Header ) );
00807 
00809         B_ASSERT( ( header.formatFlags & kFourCCFlag ) == 0 );
00810 
00812         if ( header.bitCount == 8 )
00813         {
00815                 if ( header.alphaMask != 0xFF )
00816                 {
00817                         B_ERROR( "Unsupported format for image " + name.GetPathString() + ": Only alpha textures are supported for 8-bit greyscale." );
00818                 }
00819                 _fmt = EF_I8;
00820         }
00821         else if ( header.bitCount == 24 )
00822         {
00824                 if ( header.redMask != 0xFF0000 || header.greenMask != 0xFF00 || header.blueMask != 0xFF )
00825                 {
00826                         B_ERROR( "Unsupported format for 24-bit image " + name.GetPathString() + ": Must be BGR format!" );
00827                 }
00828                 _fmt = EF_BGR24;
00829         }
00830         else if ( header.bitCount == 32 )
00831         {
00833                 if ( header.alphaMask != 0xFF000000 || header.redMask != 0xFF0000 || header.greenMask != 0xFF00 || header.blueMask != 0xFF )
00834                 {
00835                         B_ERROR( "Unsupported format for 32-bit image " + name.GetPathString() + ": Must be BGRA format!" );
00836                 }
00837                 _fmt = EF_BGRA32;
00838         }
00839         else
00840         {
00842                 B_ERROR( "Unsupported format for image " + name.GetPathString() + "!" );
00843         }
00844 
00849         unsigned long imageSize = header.pitchOrLinSize * header.height;
00850 
00851         _width = header.width;
00852         _height = header.height;
00853 
00855         _maxMipCount = CalcMaxMipCount();
00856 
00858         unsigned long ddsBytesPerPel = header.bitCount / 8;
00859         _bytesPerPel = ddsBytesPerPel;
00860         unsigned long mipMapCount = header.mipMapCount > 0 ? header.mipMapCount : 1;
00861 
00863         if ( mipMapCount != 1 && mipMapCount != _maxMipCount )
00864         {
00865                 B_ERROR( "Error loading image " + name.GetPathString() + ": When using custom mipmaps, all must be specified ( down to 1x1 )!" );
00866         }
00867 
00868         _bits = new void *[ _maxMipCount ];
00869         MemSet( _bits, 0, _maxMipCount * sizeof( void * ) );
00870 
00871         unsigned char* pixelRow = ( unsigned char* )alloca( _width * ddsBytesPerPel );
00872         for ( unsigned int mipLevel = 0; mipLevel < mipMapCount; ++mipLevel )
00873         {
00875                 unsigned int width = Max( header.width >> mipLevel, 1UL );
00876                 unsigned int ddsPitch = width * ddsBytesPerPel;
00877                 unsigned int imgPitch = width * _bytesPerPel;
00878                 unsigned int height = Max( header.height >> mipLevel, 1UL );
00879                 _bits[ mipLevel ] = new unsigned char[ _bytesPerPel * height ];
00880 
00882                 unsigned int row = height;
00883                 while ( row-- > 0 )
00884                 {
00886                         reader.ReadBytes( pixelRow, ddsPitch );
00887                         for ( unsigned int pixel = 0; pixel < width; ++pixel )
00888                         {
00889                                 MemCopy( ( unsigned char* )_bits[ mipLevel ] + row * imgPitch + pixel * _bytesPerPel,
00890                                                 pixelRow + pixel * ddsBytesPerPel,
00891                                                 ddsBytesPerPel );
00892                         }
00893                 }
00894         }
00895         _mipCount = mipMapCount;
00896 }
00897 
00898 //----------------------------------------------------------
00899 void
00900 GrImage::ReadTGA( const UPath& name, UReader& reader )
00901 {
00902 #ifdef __GNUC__
00903  #pragma pack ( push, 1 )
00904 #else
00905  #pragma pack ( push )
00906  #pragma pack ( 1 )
00907 #endif
00908 struct STGAHeaderInfo
00909 {
00910         unsigned char   idlen;    
00911         unsigned char   cmtype;   
00912         unsigned char   imtype;   
00913         unsigned short  cmorg;    
00914         unsigned short  cmcnt;    
00915         unsigned char   cmsize;   
00916         unsigned short  imxorg;   
00917         unsigned short  imyorg;   
00918         unsigned short  imwidth;  
00919         unsigned short  imheight; 
00920         unsigned char   imdepth;  
00921         unsigned char   imdesc;   
00922 };
00923 #pragma pack ( pop )
00924 
00925         STGAHeaderInfo header;
00926         reader.ReadBytes( &header, sizeof( STGAHeaderInfo ) );
00927 
00929         if ( ( header.imtype & 2 ) == 0 )
00930         {
00931                 B_ERROR( "Unable to load image " + name.GetPathString() + ": Invalid format (Non-palettized images only)!" );
00932         }
00933         B_ASSERT( IsPow2( header.imwidth ) );
00934         B_ASSERT( IsPow2( header.imheight ) );
00935 
00937         _width = header.imwidth;
00938         _height = header.imheight;
00939 
00941         _maxMipCount = CalcMaxMipCount();
00942 
00944         if ( !IsPow2( _width ) || !IsPow2( _height ) )
00945         {
00946                 B_ERROR( "Unable to load image " + name.GetPathString() + ": Dimensions must be a power of 2!" );
00947         }
00948 
00950         if ( header.imdepth == 32 )
00951         {
00952                 _fmt = EF_BGRA32;
00953         }
00954         else if ( header.imdepth == 24 )
00955         {
00956                 _fmt = EF_BGR24;
00957         }
00958         else if ( header.imdepth == 8 )
00959         {
00960                 _fmt = EF_I8;
00961         }
00962         else
00963         {
00966                 B_ERROR( "Unable to load image " + name.GetPathString() + ": It is not a supported color format!" );
00967         }
00968 
00969         unsigned int bpp = header.imdepth;
00970 
00972 //      unsigned int tgaBytesPerPel = bpp / 8;
00973         _bytesPerPel = bpp / 8; 
00974         _bits = new void* [ _maxMipCount ];
00975         MemSet( _bits, 0, _maxMipCount * sizeof( void* ) );
00976 
00977         unsigned int imgStride = _bytesPerPel * _width;
00978         unsigned int imageSize = _height * imgStride;
00979 
00981         reader.Skip( header.idlen );
00982 
00984         unsigned char* dst = 0;
00985         _bits[ 0 ] = new unsigned char [ imageSize ];
00986 
00988         if ( ( header.imtype & 8 ) == 0 )
00989         {
00991                 reader.ReadBytes( _bits[ 0 ], imageSize );
00992 /*
00993                 unsigned char* src = 0;
00994                 unsigned char* pixelRow = ( unsigned char* )alloca( tgaStride );
00995                 for ( unsigned int y = 0; y < _height; ++y )
00996                 {
00997                         dst = ( unsigned char* )_bits[ 0 ] + y * imgStride;
00998                         src = pixelRow;
00999                         reader.ReadBytes( pixelRow, tgaStride );
01000                         for ( unsigned int x = 0; x < _width; ++x )
01001                         {
01002                                 for ( unsigned int e = 0; e < _bytesPerPel; ++e, ++src, ++dst )
01003                                 {
01004                                         *dst = *src;
01005                                 }
01006                         }
01007                 }
01008 */
01009         }
01010         else
01011         {
01013                 dst = ( unsigned char* )_bits[ 0 ];
01014                 unsigned char* end = ( unsigned char* )_bits[ 0 ] + imageSize;
01015                 unsigned int totalBytes = _height * imgStride;
01016                 while ( dst != end )
01017                 {
01019                         unsigned int cmd = reader.ReadUChar();
01020                         unsigned int len = cmd & 0x7F;
01021 
01023                         if ( cmd & 0x80 )
01024                         {
01026                                 unsigned char pel[ 4 ];
01027                                 reader.ReadBytes( pel, _bytesPerPel );
01028                                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i <= len; ++i )
01029                                         for ( unsigned int e = 0; e < _bytesPerPel; ++e, ++dst )
01030                                                 *dst = pel[ e ];
01031                         }
01032                         else
01033                         {
01035                                 unsigned int size = len * _bytesPerPel + _bytesPerPel;
01036                                 reader.ReadBytes( dst, size );
01037                                 dst += size;
01038                         }
01039                 }
01040         }
01041 
01043 
01044 
01046 }
01047 
01048 //----------------------------------------------------------
01049 unsigned int
01050 GrImage::CalcMaxMipCount() const
01051 {
01052         unsigned int maxMipCount = 1;
01053         unsigned int mipWidth = _width;
01054         unsigned int mipHeight = _height;
01055         while ( mipWidth != 1 || mipHeight != 1 )
01056         {
01057                 mipWidth = Max( mipWidth >> 1, 1U );
01058                 mipHeight = Max( mipHeight >> 1, 1U );
01059                 ++maxMipCount;
01060         }
01061 
01063         return maxMipCount;
01064 }
01065 
01066 //----------------------------------------------------------
01067 bool
01068 GrImage::IsFloatImage() const
01069 {
01070 //      ( _fmt == EF_RGB24 || _fmt == EF_RGBA32 || _fmt == EF_L8 || _fmt == EF_LA16 );
01071         return ( _fmt == EF_BGR96F || _fmt == EF_BGRA128F || _fmt == EF_LA64F || _fmt == EF_I16F );
01072 }
01073 
01074 //----------------------------------------------------------
01075 void
01076 GrImage::EnsureMipLevel( unsigned int level, bool normalMap )
01077 {
01078         B_ASSERT( level < _maxMipCount );
01079         if ( _bits[ level ] == 0 )
01080         {
01082                 B_ASSERT( level != 0 );
01083 
01085                 unsigned int prevLevel = level - 1;
01086                 EnsureMipLevel( prevLevel, normalMap );
01087 
01089                 bool bytes = !IsFloatImage();
01090 
01092                 GenMipLevelFunc genMipLevelFunc = GenMipLevelBytes;
01093                 if ( bytes )
01094                 {
01095                         if ( normalMap )
01096                                 genMipLevelFunc = GenMipLevelBytesNM;
01097                         else
01098                                 genMipLevelFunc = GenMipLevelBytes;
01099                 }
01100                 else
01101                 {
01103                         B_ASSERT( false );
01104                         B_ERROR( "Support for floating point textures is not yet implemented." );
01105                 }
01106 
01108                 unsigned int prevWidth = Max( _width >> prevLevel, 1U );
01109                 unsigned int prevHeight = Max( _height >> prevLevel, 1U );
01110                 _bits[ level ] = genMipLevelFunc( _bits[ prevLevel ], prevWidth, prevHeight, _elemsPerPixel[ _fmt ] );
01111                 ++_mipCount;
01112         }
01113 }
01114

01116 //**********************************************************
01118 //**********************************************************
01119 
01120 //----------------------------------------------------------
01121 void*
01122 GenMipLevelBytes( void* srcIn, unsigned int inWidth, unsigned int inHeight, unsigned int elemsPerPixel )
01123 {
01125         B_ASSERT( inWidth > 0 && inHeight > 0 );
01126         B_ASSERT( elemsPerPixel <= 4 && elemsPerPixel > 0 );
01127 
01129         unsigned int inStride = inWidth * elemsPerPixel;
01130         unsigned int mipWidth = inWidth >> 1;
01131         unsigned int mipHeight = inHeight >> 1;
01132 
01134         unsigned char* out = 0;
01135         unsigned char* dst = 0;
01136         unsigned char* src = ( unsigned char* )srcIn;
01137 
01139         if ( mipWidth == 0 || mipHeight == 0 )
01140         {
01142                 B_ASSERT( mipWidth != 0 || mipHeight != 0 );
01143 
01144                 unsigned int len = ( mipWidth + mipHeight );
01145                 out = dst = new unsigned char[ len * elemsPerPixel ];
01146                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < len; ++i, src += elemsPerPixel*2 )
01147                         for ( unsigned int e = 0; e < elemsPerPixel; ++e, ++dst )
01148                                 *dst = ( src[ e ] + src[ elemsPerPixel + e ] ) >> 1;
01149         }
01150         else
01151         {
01153                 out = dst = new unsigned char[ mipWidth * mipHeight * elemsPerPixel ];
01154                 for ( unsigned int y = 0; y < mipHeight; ++y, src += inStride )
01155                         for ( unsigned int x = 0; x < mipWidth; ++x, src += elemsPerPixel*2 )
01156                                 for ( unsigned int e = 0; e < elemsPerPixel; ++e, ++dst )
01157                                         *dst = ( src[ e ] + src[ elemsPerPixel + e ] + src[ inStride + e ] + src[ inStride + elemsPerPixel + e ] ) >> 2;
01158         }
01159 
01161         return out;
01162 }
01163 
01164 //----------------------------------------------------------
01165 void*
01166 GenMipLevelBytesBorder( void* srcIn, unsigned int inWidth, unsigned int inHeight, unsigned int elemsPerPixel )
01167 {
01168         B_ASSERT( inWidth > 0 && inHeight > 0 );
01169         B_ASSERT( elemsPerPixel > 0 && elemsPerPixel <= 4 );
01170 
01172         void* out = GenMipLevelBytes( srcIn, inWidth, inHeight, elemsPerPixel );
01173 
01175         unsigned char* src = ( unsigned char* )srcIn;
01176         unsigned char borderColor[ 4 ];
01177         for ( unsigned int e = 0; e < elemsPerPixel; ++e )
01178                 borderColor[ e ] = src[ e ];
01179 
01181         ReplaceMipBorder( out, inWidth >> 1, inHeight >> 1, elemsPerPixel, borderColor );
01182 
01184         return out;
01185 }

01189 {
01190         B_ASSERT( false );
01191         return 0;

01194 //----------------------------------------------------------
01195 void* GenMipLevelBytesBorderBGR15_A1( void* src, unsigned int inWidth, unsigned int inHeight, unsigned int elemsPerPixel )
01196 {
01197         B_ASSERT( false );

01200 
01201 //----------------------------------------------------------
01202 void*
01203 GenMipLevelBytesNM( void* srcIn, unsigned int inWidth, unsigned int inHeight, unsigned int elemsPerPixel )
01204 {
01206         B_ASSERT( inWidth > 0 && inHeight > 0 );
01207         B_ASSERT( elemsPerPixel == 3 || elemsPerPixel == 4 );
01208 
01210 //      unsigned int elemCount = _elemsPerPixel[ _fmt ];
01211         unsigned int inStride = inWidth * elemsPerPixel;
01212         unsigned int mipWidth = inWidth >> 1;
01213         unsigned int mipHeight = inHeight >> 1;
01214 
01216         unsigned char* out = 0;
01217         unsigned char* dst = 0;
01218         unsigned char* src = ( unsigned char* )srcIn;
01219 
01221         const MVec3 up( 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f );
01222         const float kWeightFudge = 20.0f;
01223 
01225         if ( mipWidth == 0 || mipHeight == 0 )
01226         {
01228                 B_ASSERT( mipWidth != 0 || mipHeight != 0 );
01229 
01230                 unsigned int len = ( mipWidth + mipHeight );    
01231                 out = dst = new unsigned char[ len * elemsPerPixel ];
01232                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < len; ++i, src += elemsPerPixel*2, dst += elemsPerPixel )
01233                 {
01234                         MVec3 normal0( UNPACK_QFLOAT( src[ 0 ] ), UNPACK_QFLOAT( src[ 1 ] ), UNPACK_QFLOAT( src[ 2 ] ) );
01235                         MVec3 normal1( UNPACK_QFLOAT( src[ elemsPerPixel ] ), UNPACK_QFLOAT( src[ elemsPerPixel+1 ] ), UNPACK_QFLOAT( src[ elemsPerPixel+2 ] ) );
01236                         float weight0 = 1.0f; //1.0f + kWeightFudge * ( 1.0f - up.Dot( normal0 ) );
01237                         float weight1 = 1.0f; //1.0f + kWeightFudge * ( 1.0f - up.Dot( normal1 ) );
01238                         MVec3 avg = ( weight0*normal0 + weight1*normal1 ).Normalized();
01239                         dst[ 0 ] = PACK_QFLOAT( avg.GetX() );
01240                         dst[ 1 ] = PACK_QFLOAT( avg.GetY() );
01241                         dst[ 2 ] = PACK_QFLOAT( avg.GetZ() );
01242 
01244                         if ( elemsPerPixel == 4 )
01245                                 dst[ 3 ] = ( src[ 3 ] + src[ elemsPerPixel + 3 ] ) >> 1;
01246                 }
01247         }
01248         else
01249         {
01251                 out = dst = new unsigned char[ mipWidth * mipHeight * elemsPerPixel ];
01252 
01254                 for ( unsigned int y = 0; y < mipHeight; ++y, src += inStride )
01255                         for ( unsigned int x = 0; x < mipWidth; ++x, src += elemsPerPixel*2, dst += elemsPerPixel )
01256                         {
01258                                 MVec3 normal0( UNPACK_QFLOAT( src[ 0 ] ), UNPACK_QFLOAT( src[ 1 ] ), UNPACK_QFLOAT( src[ 2 ] ) );
01259                                 MVec3 normal1( UNPACK_QFLOAT( src[ elemsPerPixel ] ), UNPACK_QFLOAT( src[ elemsPerPixel+1 ] ), UNPACK_QFLOAT( src[ elemsPerPixel+2 ] ) );
01260                                 MVec3 normal2( UNPACK_QFLOAT( src[ inStride ] ), UNPACK_QFLOAT( src[ inStride+1 ] ), UNPACK_QFLOAT( src[ inStride+2 ] ) );
01261                                 MVec3 normal3( UNPACK_QFLOAT( src[ inStride+elemsPerPixel ] ), UNPACK_QFLOAT( src[ inStride+elemsPerPixel+1 ] ), UNPACK_QFLOAT( src[ inStride+elemsPerPixel+2 ] ) );
01262                                 float weight0 = 1.0f; //+ kWeightFudge * ( 1.0f - up.Dot( normal0 ) );
01263                                 float weight1 = 1.0f; //+ kWeightFudge * ( 1.0f - up.Dot( normal1 ) );
01264                                 float weight2 = 1.0f; //+ kWeightFudge * ( 1.0f - up.Dot( normal2 ) );
01265                                 float weight3 = 1.0f; //+ kWeightFudge * ( 1.0f - up.Dot( normal3 ) );
01266                                 MVec3 avg = ( weight0*normal0 + weight1*normal1 + normal2 + normal3 ).Normalized();
01267                                 dst[ 0 ] = PACK_QFLOAT( avg.GetX() );
01268                                 dst[ 1 ] = PACK_QFLOAT( avg.GetY() );
01269                                 dst[ 2 ] = PACK_QFLOAT( avg.GetZ() );
01270 
01272                                 if ( elemsPerPixel == 4 )
01273                                         dst[ 3 ] = ( src[ 3 ] + src[ elemsPerPixel + 3 ] + src[ inStride + 3 ] + src[ inStride + elemsPerPixel + 3 ] ) >> 2;
01274                         }
01275         }
01276 
01278         return out;
01279 }
01280 
01281 //----------------------------------------------------------
01282 void*
01283 GenMipLevelBytesNMBorder( void* srcIn, unsigned int inWidth, unsigned int inHeight, unsigned int elemsPerPixel )
01284 {
01285         B_ASSERT( inWidth > 0 && inHeight > 0 );
01286         B_ASSERT( elemsPerPixel == 3 || elemsPerPixel == 4 );
01287 
01289         void* out = GenMipLevelBytesNM( srcIn, inWidth, inHeight, elemsPerPixel );
01290 
01292         unsigned char* src = ( unsigned char* )srcIn;
01293         unsigned char borderNormal[ 4 ];
01294         for ( unsigned int e = 0; e < elemsPerPixel; ++e )
01295                 borderNormal[ e ] = src[ e ];
01296         
01298         ReplaceMipBorder( out, inWidth >> 1, inHeight >> 1, elemsPerPixel, borderNormal );
01299 
01301         return out;
01302 }

01304 //----------------------------------------------------------
01305 void*
01306 GenMipLevelFloats( void* srcIn, unsigned int inWidth, unsigned int inHeight, unsigned int elemsPerPixel )
01307 {
01308         B_ASSERT( false );
01309         return 0;
01310 /*
01312         B_ASSERT( inWidth > 0 && inHeight > 0 );
01313 
01315         unsigned int elemCount = _elemsPerPixel[ _fmt ];
01316         unsigned int elemCount2x = elemCount << 1;
01317         unsigned int mipWidth = Max( inWidth >> 1, 1U );
01318         unsigned int mipHeight = Max( inHeight >> 1, 1U );
01319         unsigned int elemWidth = mipWidth * elemCount;
01320         unsigned int inElemWidth = inWidth * elemCount;
01321         unsigned int size = mipHeight * elemWidth;
01322         float* src = ( float* )srcIn;
01323         float* dest = new float[ size ];
01324 
01326         for ( unsigned int lineStart = 0, y0 = 0, y1 = inElemWidth; lineStart < size; lineStart += elemWidth, y0 += inElemWidth, y1 += inElemWidth )
01327         {
01329                 for ( unsigned int x = 0, x0 = 0, x1 = elemCount; x < elemWidth; x += elemCount, x0 += elemCount2x, x1 += elemCount2x )
01330                 {
01332                         for ( unsigned int e = 0; e < elemCount; ++e )
01333                                 dest[ lineStart + x + e ] += ( src[ y0 + x0 + e ] + src[ y0 + x1 + e ] + src[ y1 + x0 + e ] + src[ y1 + x1 + e ] ) * 0.25f;
01334                 }
01335         }
01336         return dest;
01337 */
01338 }
01339 
01340 static void ReplaceMipBorder( void* data, unsigned int mipWidth, unsigned int mipHeight, unsigned int elemsPerPixel, unsigned char* borderColor )
01341 {
01343         unsigned char* dst = ( unsigned char* )data;
01344         if ( mipWidth == 0 || mipHeight == 0 )
01345         {
01347                 unsigned int len = mipWidth + mipHeight;
01348 
01350                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < len; ++i, dst += elemsPerPixel )
01351                         for ( unsigned int e = 0; e < elemsPerPixel; ++e )
01352                                 dst[ e ] = borderColor[ e ];
01353         }
01354         else
01355         {
01357                 unsigned int mipStride = mipWidth * elemsPerPixel;
01358 
01360                 for ( unsigned int x = 0; x < mipWidth; ++x, dst += elemsPerPixel )
01361                         for ( unsigned int e = 0; e < elemsPerPixel; ++e )
01362                                 dst[ e ] = borderColor[ e ];
01363 
01365                 dst = ( ( unsigned char* )data ) + ( mipHeight - 1 ) * mipStride;
01366                 for ( unsigned int x = 0; x < mipWidth; ++x, dst += elemsPerPixel )
01367                         for ( unsigned int e = 0; e < elemsPerPixel; ++e )
01368                                 dst[ e ] = borderColor[ e ];
01369 
01371                 unsigned char* dstLeft = ( ( unsigned char* )data ) + mipStride;
01372                 unsigned char* dstRight = ( ( unsigned char* )data ) + ( mipStride << 1 ) - elemsPerPixel;
01373                 unsigned int lastRow = ( mipHeight - 1 );
01374                 for ( unsigned int y = 1; y < lastRow; ++y, dstLeft += mipStride, dstRight += mipStride )
01375                 {
01376                         for ( unsigned int e = 0; e < elemsPerPixel; ++e )
01377                         {
01378                                 dstLeft[ e ] = borderColor[ e ];
01379                                 dstRight[ e ] = borderColor[ e ];
01380                         }
01381                 }
01382         }
01383 }
